page.title: 10THE SHOOTING BOX
page.content: On the top of the{Long Mynd}is a building called the{Shooting Box. The roof is made of corrugated iron.One side of the box is made of brick the other side is underground so you cannot see it.It has one door and one room with a roof dropped on it.Inside it was dark. The Government was not happy because the{Shooting Box }was built in an old burial ground in a small hill which was the site of a{Tumulus}. The box is used as a base for shooting Grouse,a popular{game bird.} We think it was built into the side of the{Tumulus}for camouflage;all you can see is the roof. The{beaters}would drive the birds to the box where the shooters would be waiting.
